gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 127, Spurs 122
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeated the Spurs, 127-122. De'Aaron Fox scored a team-high 28 points, along with nine assists, and five rebounds as Domantas Sabonis (22 points, 11 rebounds, 11 assists) and Malik Monk (21 points) totaled 43 points in the win. Sabonis leads the league with 19 triple-doubles on the year and now has 51 in his career. Devin Vassell led the Spurs with 32 points as Victor Wembanyama had a massive line of 19 points, 13 rebounds, five steals, five blocks, and four assists. The Kings improve to 32-23 as the Spurs move to 11-45.
